phrs.translation: 白变种, 白化体, 阿尔比诺斯

sentences.sentence: Campaigners say more than 17 albinos have been killed in Tanzania in the last few years.
sentences.translation: 活动家称最近几年已经有超过17人在坦桑尼亚被杀。

sentences.sentence: Besides looking different, which may cause social problems, albinos also have various impairments.
sentences.translation: 除了寻找不同的，这可能会导致社会问题，白老鼠也有各种缺陷。

sentences.sentence: AIM: To compare squamous cell carcinomas of the eyelids in albinos and blacks among the Ibos of Nigeria.
sentences.translation: 目的：比较尼日利亚伊布人中黑人和白化病人眼睑鳞状上皮细胞癌的发病情况。
